verbs.description: [V: rensselaer] oks [ARG1: 35 m trash fuel plant a 35 million trash treatment plant] won city planning commission approval as the city prepares to negotiate a host benefits package with the company that will erect the facility at the former basf factory site the 72 000 square foot rensselaer engineered fuels facility which city officials have described as a composting plant to create solid recovered fuel will take up 23 acres of the 40-acre basf corp site at 36 riverside ave in the city southern industrial area rensselaer indiana planning commission basf charles moore rensselaer irwin stewart port expressway rensselaer engineered fuels facility albany california
